data.title: Nobel prize winning playwright Harold Pinter with his wife

data.meta_description: Prints of Nobel prize winning playwright Harold Pinter with his wife Lady Antonia Fraser, daughter of Lord Longford
data.text:
Memory Lane Photo Prints and Wall Art

Nobel prize winning playwright Harold Pinter with his wife Lady Antonia Fraser

Nobel prize winning playwright Harold Pinter with his wife Lady Antonia Fraser, daughter of Lord Longford, pictured in the hall of their home. 10th October 1980. Â© Mirrorpix

Framed Prints

Bring the timeless elegance of Nobel laureate Harold Pinter and his wife, Lady Antonia Fraser, into your home with this stunning framed print from Memory Lane Prints. Captured by renowned photographer Eric Harlow on 10th October 1980, this image shows the iconic couple in the hall of their home, exuding sophistication and charm. Add this unique piece to your decor and relive the memories of a bygone era. Each framed print is meticulously crafted with high-quality materials to ensure a long-lasting and beautiful addition to your space.

Photo Prints

Relive history with this captivating photograph from Memory Lane Prints' Media Storehouse collection. Witness a moment of timeless elegance as Nobel Prize-winning playwright Harold Pinter and his wife, Lady Antonia Fraser, gracefully pose in the hall of their home. Captured by renowned photographer Eric Harlow on 10th October 1980, this image beautifully preserves a significant moment in the lives of these literary icons. Add this exquisite piece to your collection and bring a touch of history into your space.

Poster Prints

Bring a touch of literary history into your home with our exquisite Harold Pinter and Lady Antonia Fraser poster print from Memory Lane Prints. This stunning image, captured by Eric Harlow on 10th October 1980, shows the Nobel Prize-winning playwright Harold Pinter and his wife, Lady Antonia Fraser, in their home. The black-and-white photograph adds an air of timeless elegance, making it a must-have for any art or literature enthusiast. Experience the magic of this iconic moment in literary history and elevate your decor with our high-quality poster print.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Bring the intrigue and brilliance of Nobel laureate Harold Pinter and his esteemed wife, Lady Antonia Fraser, into your home with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse and Memory Lane Prints. This captivating puzzle features an iconic photograph of the renowned playwright and his wife, taken in their home on 10th October 1980 by Eric Harlow. Assemble the intricate pieces and relive the history, art, and literature that have shaped our world. A perfect activity for puzzle enthusiasts and history buffs alike, this unique puzzle is sure to inspire conversation and admiration.
